text: do you know the bootstrap icons? Yes, Bootstrap Icons is a set of free, scalable vector icons that work at any size, based on SVG format. They were first introduced in 2021 as part of the Bootstrap 5 release and are available under an open-source license. Bootstrap Icons cover a wide range of common needs for web design and development, including interface elements, navigation, alerts, and more. Bootstrap Icons are designed to be easy to use and integrate into projects that utilize the Bootstrap framework. They can be customized in terms of color and size directly within your HTML or CSS code, making them highly flexible and suitable for various design requirements.
